title: Rocky Mountain National Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        NPS   Â      For over 20 years, Rocky's Education and Outreach Program has extended student classrooms into the park. Learners from the park's gateway communities and Colorado's Front Range come to explore the mountains found in their very own backyards. This program reaches over 10,000 students each year and continues to grow.         Plan a Field Trip  Rocky Mountain National Park offers many ways for students to experience a different kind of classroom setting.         Classroom Resources Find inspiring ways to connect students to science and research in the park.         Professional Development Students aren't the only ones who can learn. Teachers also combine their expertise with experience in the park.         Education Portal An online resource helps teachers explore various subjects from all national park units.
